# get_vad_features { #easyaligner.data.dataset.AudioFileDataset.get_vad_features }

```python
data.dataset.AudioFileDataset.get_vad_features(audio_path, metadata, sr=16000)
```

Extract features for each VAD chunk in the metadata.

The global start time of each chunk is also returned for debugging purposes.
This method is used when `alignment_strategy` is set to `chunk`.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

+------------+---------------+-------------------------+------------+
| Name       | Type          | Description             | Default    |
+============+===============+=========================+============+
| audio_path | str           | Path to the audio file. | _required_ |
+------------+---------------+-------------------------+------------+
| metadata   | AudioMetadata | Metadata object.        | _required_ |
+------------+---------------+-------------------------+------------+
| sr         | int           | Sample rate.            | `16000`    |
+------------+---------------+-------------------------+------------+

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

+--------+--------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name   | Type         | Description                                                                     |
+========+==============+=================================================================================+
|        | list of dict | List of dictionaries containing extracted features and metadata for each chunk. |
+--------+--------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
